name: Portal
description: Play out of turn to defend against another player's Pew.

name: Cryostatis
description: Play on another player. That player may lose a turn.

name: Tactical nuke
description: Play out of turn to defend against another player's Pew.

name: EMP shockwave
description: Choose another players card to discard.

name: Interstellar commander
description: Wins when all alien invaders are destroyed.

name: Peace officer
description: Wins when all alien invaders are destroyed.

name: Bounty hunter
description: Wins if kills the most other players.

name: Alien invader
description: Wins when Interstellar commander is killed.
